r.d: Classes to represent Tuples, general Vectors, and 2D-/3D-vectors, as well as a static class for vector operations.
r.n: Made the data in the constructor optional. Added setData() and getData() methods to handle vector initialization. Reorganized the directories for tests and documentation. It is recommended to uninstall Math_Vector before installing this release to avoid lingering files: $ pear uninstall Math_Vector $ pear install Math_Vector Included explicit optional dependency on PHPUnit 0.6.2 or older. Newer versions of PHPUnit require PHP5.
